H0.text: Peter Simple, Jack Horner and Ben Nevis have all won which famous sporting event. Cheltenham Gold Cup

H1.text: Peter Simple, Jack Horner and Ben Nevis have all won which famous sporting event. Epsom Derby

H2.text: Peter Simple, Jack Horner and Ben Nevis have all won which famous sporting event. Royal Ascot

H3.text: Peter Simple, Jack Horner and Ben Nevis have all won which famous sporting event. Grand National

A4.text: Peter Simple was the third racehorse in history to win the Grand National steeplechase twice.

A5.text: Peter Simple won the Grand National in 1849.
